  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SmartHomeController getInstance()
      Singleton pattern to ensure that there's only a single instance of SmartHomeController.
      Returns:
      the only SmartHomeController instance

    • scenariosListToString

      public String scenariosListToString()
      Returns a string containing the user-defined scenarios.
      Returns:
      a string with the names of all user-defined scenarios

    • scenarioNameCollision

      public boolean scenarioNameCollision(String scenarioName)
      Checks if a device with @param scenarioname is already in the device list.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to check
      Returns:
      true if the scenario name is already in use, false otherwise

    • applyScenario

      public void applyScenario(String scenarioName)
      Applies a scenario to the SmartHomeController. This method will execute the commands of the scenario and update the monitoring states of observable devices.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to apply

    • removeScenario

      public void removeScenario(String scenarioName)
      Removes a scenario from the user-defined scenarios.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to remove

    • addCommandToScenario

      public void addCommandToScenario(String devName, long delaySecs, long repeatSecs, Command cmd, String scenarioName)
      Adds a command to a scenario.
      Parameters:
      devName - the name of the device on which the command will be executed
      delaySecs - the delay before the command is executed
      repeatSecs - the interval at which the command is repeated
      cmd - the command to execute
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to add the command to

    • scenarioCommandsToString

      public String scenarioCommandsToString(String scenarioName)
      Returns a string representation of the commands in a scenario.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to get the commands from
      Returns:
      a string with all commands in the scenario, or an empty string if the scenario does not exist

    • removeCommandToScenario

      public void removeCommandToScenario(String scenarioName, int index)

    • setDeviceMonitoring

      public void setDeviceMonitoring(ObservableDevice device, boolean state)
      Adds a device for the SmartHomeController to monitor.
      Parameters:
      device - to monitor
      state - of the monitoring

    • toggleDeviceMonitoring

      public void toggleDeviceMonitoring(ObservableDevice device)
      Toggles the monitoring state for a given device.
      Parameters:
      device - to change the monitoring state of

    • printDevMonitoringState

      public String printDevMonitoringState(Device dev)
      Gives back a string with the monitoring state of a device.
      Parameters:
      dev - any type of device, observable or not.
      Returns:
      non-monitorable if the device is not an ObservableDevice, monitored if the device is monitored, non-monitored otherwise.

    • scheduledScenariosToString

      public String scheduledScenariosToString()
      Returns a string representing a list of all scheduled scenarios.
      Parameters:
      prepend - is a string added before each line printed
      Returns:
      a string with every scheduled scenario of the SmartHomeController.

    • addDevice

      public void addDevice(Device device)
      Adds a device to the SmartHomeController device list.
      Parameters:
      device - to add

    • updateFunctionality

      public boolean updateFunctionality(String devName, Device updatedDevice)
      Updates the functionality of a device tracked by the SmartHomeController. The method replaces the entry inside the device list with the updated one, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      devName - the name of the device to update
      updatedDevice - the new device to replace the old one
      Returns:
      true if the device was successfully updated, false if the device to update does not exist

    • removeDevice

      public boolean removeDevice(Device device)
      Removes a specific device from the SmartHomeController device list, if it exists.
      Parameters:
      device - to remove

    • deviceListToString

      public String deviceListToString(String type)
      Returns the string representing the device list of type type of the SmartHomeController if type is empty, it returns all devices.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of device to filter the list by. If empty, it returns all devices
      Returns:
      a string with the device list

    • isIn

      public boolean isIn(String deviceName)
      Parameters:
      deviceName -
      Returns:
      true if an object that implements the Device interface with this deviceName is in the device list of the SmartHomeController. Otherwise, it will return false.

    • triggerEvent

      public void triggerEvent(Event event)
      Triggers all of the commands of a given event.
      Parameters:
      event - to react to.3

    • update

      public void update(ObservableDevice dev, String eventType)
      Updates the SmartHomeController with the event type specified by eventType If the device is being monitored, it will trigger the event.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      dev - the device that has sent the notification
      eventType - the type of event that has been notified by the device

    • getDeviceFromName

      public Device getDeviceFromName(String devName)
      Returns the instance of a device registered to the SmartHomeController with the specified name
      Parameters:
      devName - is the name of the device
      Returns:
      the object which name is equal to devName

    • scheduleCommand

      public void scheduleCommand(String devName, long delaySecs, long repeatSecs, Command cmd)
      Schedules a certain command that a device must run.
      Parameters:
      devName - is the name of the device
      delaySecs - if it's equal to 0, the command runs instantly. Otherwise, it will be executed after the specified amount of seconds
      repeatSecs - if it's equal to 0, the command runs once. Otherwise, it will be executed at every specified amount of time.
      cmd - is the command that has to be executed

    • addScenario

      public void addScenario(String scenarioName)
      Adds a new scenario to the list of user scenarios.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - the name of the scenario to add

    • isScenarioScheduled

      public boolean isScenarioScheduled(String scenarioName)
      Check if a scenario is scheduled
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - is the name of the scenario to check
      Returns:
      true if the scenario is scheduled, false otherwise

    • scheduleScenario

      public void scheduleScenario(String scenarioName, long delaySecs)
      Schedules a scenario to be run after a certain delay.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - is the name of the scenario
      scenario - is the scenario to be run
      delaySecs - is the delay in seconds before the scenario is run

    • killScenario

      public void killScenario(String scenarioName)
      Kills a scheduled scenario. The scenario is not removed from the list of available scenarios, but will not be executed anymore unless scheduled again.
      Parameters:
      index - is the index of the scenario to be killed

    • changeScenarioName

      public void changeScenarioName(String oldName, String newName)
      Changes the name of a given scenario. The name won't be changed if a device with the same name as newName already exists.
      Parameters:
      oldName -
      newName -

    • setScenarioDeviceMonitoring

      public void setScenarioDeviceMonitoring(ObservableDevice device, boolean state, String scenarioName)
      Sets the monitoring of a device for a certain scenario.
      Parameters:
      device - to change the monitoring state of.
      state - the specified monitoring state.
      scenarioName -

    • scheduledCommandsToString

      public String scheduledCommandsToString()
      Returns:
      a String containing every scheduled commands, with the device that will execute it, their time delay and their repeat-time.

    • killCommand

      public boolean killCommand(int index)

    • flushTasks

      public void flushTasks()
      Flushes all the scheduled commands, cancelling them. This method is used to clean up the scheduled commands when the controller is shut down. Note that flushing the tasks is NOT a reversible process.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down the controller, cleaning every scheduled commands.

    • setupDefaultEvents

      public void setupDefaultEvents()
      Sets up the default events for the system.

    • measureTemperatures

      public void measureTemperatures()
      Calculates the temperature of the environment and updates the devices about it.

    • detectOpeningDoor

      public void detectOpeningDoor(String doorName)
      "Detects" the opening of a door by stimulating the environment.
      Parameters:
      doorName - the name of the door to be opened. If the name is "random", a random door will be opened.

    • detectClosingDoor

      public void detectClosingDoor(String doorName)
      "Detects" the opening of a door by stimulating the environment.
      Parameters:
      doorName - the name of the door to be closed. If the name is "random", a random door will be closed.

    • detectCameraPresence

      public void detectCameraPresence(String cameraName)
      Stimulates the presence detection of a camera in the environment.
      Parameters:
      cameraName - the name of the camera to be stimulated. If the name is "random", a random camera will be stimulated.
